title: Basic Routing & Task Management API
description: Build a simple REST API with Echo framework that handles task management operations including creating, reading, updating, and deleting tasks.
short_description: Learn fundamental Echo routing and build a task management REST API
learning_objectives: Implement HTTP routes (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
real_world_connection: Task management APIs are foundational to most web applications, from productivity tools to project management platforms.
requirements: Implement GET /health endpoint for health checks
Implement GET /tasks endpoint to retrieve all tasks
Implement POST /tasks endpoint to create new tasks
Implement GET /tasks/:id endpoint to get specific task
Implement PUT /tasks/:id endpoint to update tasks
Implement DELETE /tasks/:id endpoint to remove tasks
